mapper.select: SELECT STATION_ID, STATION_NAME, LINE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM SUBWAY ORDER BY ABS(LATITUDE-#{latitude}) + ABS(LONGITUDE-#{longitude}) ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT station_name, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM ( SELECT station_name, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY station_name ORDER BY ABS(LATITUDE-#{latitude}) + ABS(LONGITUDE-#{longitude})) as rn FROM SUBWAY ) SUBWAY WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY ABS(LATITUDE-#{latitude}) + ABS(LONGITUDE-#{longitude}) LIMIT 3
